links.title: Tesla (Nasdaq:TSLA) - Fundamentals Analysis
links.description: Management is one of the most important areas of a company. We look at unreasonable CEO compensation, how long the team and board of directors have been around for and insider trading. CEO CEO Bio Mr. Elon R. Musk founded Space Exploration Technologies Corporation in June 2002 and serves as its Chief Executive Officer, Chief Rocket Designer and Chief Technology Officer.

messages.body: $TSLA Bloomberg pump now? https://www.bloomberg.com/amp/news/articles/2017-07-06/electric-cars-are-about-to-boost-global-power-demand-300-fold

links.title: Plug-In Vehicles Are About to Boost Global Power Demand 300-Fold
links.description: Electric vehicles aren't just transforming the auto industry: They're also about to reshape the global power market. By 2040, more than half of all new cars sold will be plug-ins like those offered by Tesla Inc., according to a report from Bloomberg New Energy Finance.

links.title: Tesla's Model 3 is coming on Friday and it's going to be the 'largest consumer-product launch ever'

messages.body:
Tesla April registrations drop in key California market
http://www.reuters.com/article/us-tesla-california-idUSKBN19R3AP
$INFO $TSLA $MRKT

links.title: Tesla April registrations drop in key California market
links.description: SAN FRANCISCO Registrations of Tesla Inc vehicles in California, by far the largest market of the luxury electric car maker, fell 24 percent in April from a year ago, according to data from IHS Markit. The findings come as investors worry that demand for Tesla's luxury Model S sedan is waning ahead of the mass market Model 3 launch.

messages.body: $TSLA This is an easy sell all the way down to the low 200$ range. Buy back in 2018.
